item.content:encoded:
Glucosamine has been used for years to relieve joint pain due to osteoarthritis. Clinical studies have shown that it can help reduce cartilage degradation as well as aid in the rebuilding of cartilage. It has provided much needed relief from pain for millions of people and animals and enabled them to live more active, healthy lives. Well The Glucosamine Experts are not stopping there. And the industry headlines this week are talking about our latest accomplishment: demonstrating GlucosaGreen®’s potential for gut health and muscle health.

What makes you such an expert?

We at TSI Group take our tag line “The Glucosamine Experts” seriously. That means not just knowing the history of the product, but looking to the future and understanding what else this supplement can do. This promising research shows the potential for GlucosaGreen® to be an even bigger “anti-aging” supplement than previously thought. Add this news to the other unique features of GlucosaGreen® and it’s pretty clear we’ve earned the title:

  • producing GlucosaGreen® from non-GMO corn instead of shellfish reduces water use and waste generation by over 96%
  • TSI Group is the world’s largest glucosamine manufacturer
  • we have unparalleled expertise in creating raw material forms perfectly suited to specific finished dose production

Past, present, and future – GlucosaGreen® exclusively from The Glucosamine Experts at TSI Group Ltd just can’t be beat.
